name: Bomby Run - Level 4, Factory Field v1.0
name_original: Bomby Run - Level 4, Factory Field v1.0
description:
!THIS IS A MOBILE GAME!

German Description: In diesem Spiel befinden sie, der Spieler sich als Bomby in einer Alten Fabrik wieder um seinen Freund zu finden. Bomby liebt Münzen, besonders die roten! In dieser Alten Fabrik gibt es gefährliche Feinde, die du besiegen kannst, indem du auf sie drauf springst! Manche von ihnen halten 1-2 Treffer aus, manche nehmen überhaupt keinen Schaden. 

English Description: In this game you, the Player find yourself as Bomby in a old factory to find his friend. Bomby loves coins, especially the red ones! In this old factory there are dangerous enemies that you can defeat by jumping on them! Some of them take 1-2 hits, some take no damage at all. 

 Game made by Lord Zcoper 

------------------------------------------

Difficulty: Extreme 😡

------------------------------------------

Update: v1.0  

-Game release! 

How to play:
------------------------------------------
Controls:
Run Left:     Arrow Left 
Run Right:              Arrow Right
Jump:                        Arrow Up
2x Jump:                  Arrow Up 2x
------------------------------------------ 
Score:
Become a better Score by collecting the coins!
Normal Coin: + 14
Red Coin:         +300
------------------------------------------
NEW ELEMENT!
Since Level 4, Factory Field,
I present you the new game element!

The "UFO"   

You can control it with the arrow keys
It moves forward by itself. All you can do is steer up /\
With the UFO you only have 1 life so don't risk anything and follow the coins

------------------------------------------
Tips and Tricks:
Regenerate by collecting heart items (Full Health)
Jump on Enemies to deafet them!
Watch ahead to avoid unwanted situations!
Play on the Mobil Phone!
Look for the Timer! If it's shut down to 0 you Die!
------------------------------------------
Player 

Health:                  3 Hearts
Damage:               1 Heart
Speed:                    700
Jump strenght: 950

------------------------------------------
Enemies:

Red Robot
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        2 Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Jump on them
Special:        Nothing

Yellow Robot 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        1 Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Jump on them
                          Can't walk
Special:        Nothing

Electroball 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Flying unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Can be very big

Acid Monster
Location:    Acid Hole (UFO)
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     Infinity Hearts
Typ:                Ground & Flying unit
Weakness: Can ONLY heart UFO Players
Special:        There is one big boi

Screwdriver
Location:    Rare
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Jump high

Circular saw
Location:    Rare
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground & Flying unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Can hanging down with chains

Press           
Location:    Press Stage
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     2 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Faceing down/up
                         Size: small/big/fat

Gearwheel
Location:    UFO Part
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     Infinity Heart
Typ:                Flying unit
Weakness: Can ONLY heart UFO Players
Special:        Can be very big
